XII.ii.3.B.1.a
.
Actions Following Receipt of a REPS Claim
Following receipt of a claim for Restored Entitlement Program for Survivors (REPS) benefits, the St. Louis Regional Office (RO) takes the following actions when the deceased Veteran’s claims folder exists:
establishes one of the end products (EPs) discussed in
M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, 3.B.1.b
, and
clears the EP after it resolves the claim.
Note
:  ROs
other than the St. Louis RO
that receive REPS-related correspondence or a claim for benefits under REPS must forward them to the St. Louis RO according to the instructions in
M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, 3.A.5.a
.
